actions.title: Black Friday -50% for pizza!
actions.desc: Black Friday at Domino`s! And, therefore, all fluffy paws will receive a profitable discount on your favorite pizza! From 27.11. to 29.11. buy every second pizza with a discount of -50%!

actions.title: WOWeekend in Domino's!
actions.desc: Order any medium pizza for only 199 UAH or large pizza for only 239 UAH! The promotion is valid every Friday, Saturday and Sunday. The action applies on pizzas from the menu. The action does not applies on pizzas by your own recipe, aditional topping is not available in this offer.

actions.title: Contactless Delivery at Domino's!
actions.desc: Dear Customers! Your health is above all for us, so we recommend for you to place an order and pay online on our website or in the app. And in the comments to the order put the word - БЕЗКОНТАКТ, and write a little more details where the courier need to leave your order (for example, in front of the apartment door).
